name: DailyAffirmationsforChildrenwithADHD
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: These daily affirmations help children (especially those with ADHD) prepare themselves to have a great day at school. Affirmations to help children manage impulsivity, hyperactivity, emotions, focus, resiliency, relationships with friends and much more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
